sections.text:
44-7204.Applicability of act.

The Quality Assessment and Improvement Act applies to all health carriers that offer closed plans or combination plans having a closed component on and after July 15, 1998. The act, except sections 44-7207 to 44-7209, applies to all health carriers that offer open plans on and after July 1, 1999.

SourceLaws 1998, LB 1162, ยง 54.
